content.description: Old school top rope route. Continuing through the hallway past Luscious Babes, turn right into a narrower hallway. On the boulder to your left, climb just to the right of the center of the face. You'll be below Spirit

Scramble up the lower angle corner slab. 

  An ok diversion and a reasonable way to set a TR on an adjacent route, providing one is solid at the grade. 

  Nice rock.
content.protection: Trad route, most likely soloed or TR'd.
content.location: In the corner directly behind Mr. Jimmy.

content.description: Easy start lay backing to an off width crux about 2/3s of the way up. Probably doesn't see a lot of traffic.
content.protection: Big gear if you lead it, we tied off to trees to set up a top rope anchor on the left side (right facing) corner of the off width dihedral.
content.location: In the Mr. Jimmy hallway about 20ft to the right of Luscious Babes. It's a clean climb, no boulders or trees in the climb. Top out, or set a top rope and then rap down.

content.description: Still in the main hallway, it's the long clean slab down the slope and left of Screamery.  Fun route.
Good jam crack that climbs a corner through a short wider section and then traverses out underneath a roof. A bit burly for the grade but a fun trad route.
content.protection: Cams .4-3 would suffice. A .75 protects off the ground very well. Protect the end of the roof traverse well or else you'll be taking a large fall if you fall going to the chimichonga bolt (either .75 above the lip or a 3 in the roof). Bring two quickdraws as you merge with the last two bolts on Chimichonga
content.location: This route is the corner about 12 feet right of Chimichonga. It is in the L shaped hallway just past Luscious Babes.

content.description: About 12' left of Lucky, stem the hallway, commit to the main wall and follow the sport line.
The routes of the E.M.J. Wall are the ones that are located on the cliff line, in the corridor between Luscious Babes and Spirit. These are located on the same side of the wall as Luscious Babes. Â
